page.title: 18AMENITIES EXTRA:
page.content: Outside the school is a red{postbox} built into a wall. The first collection is taken at 09.50 am and the second collection is taken at 16.45 pm from Monday to Friday. On Saturdays the post comes at 09.50 am. The {postbox}was made when King George VI was on the throne. I feel that it is a pity{postboxes} were not included on the Amenities list as they are very important and interesting to study. It is important for a village to have a{telephone box}somewhere in the village in case of an emergency or an accident or a breakdown or just simply because a person hasn't got a phone at home.In a town or city help is much nearer.
